Experience.title: Senior Robotics Software Engineer
points: Spearheaded development and launch of autonomous cloud kitchens, leveraging robotics and AI to reduce food waste and address labor shortages.
Led a cross-functional team, mentoring engineers, defining sprint stories, and setting OKRs to align engineering with business goals, improving project delivery and team efficiency.
Achieved and maintained a robot task success rate above 99.9% by optimizing decision-making with Hierarchical Finite State Machines (HFSM) and Behavior Trees (BT).
Enhanced human-robot interaction by developing an app that uses an LLM to translate natural language into PDDL goals for high-level task planning, and used MLflow to track performance metrics.
Improved mAP by 25% using synthetic data generation with Unity and advanced augmentation techniques for instance segmentation of food ingredients with Mask R-CNN.
Enhanced real-time stereo matching and depth perception by integrating HITNet into OAK-D stereo cameras using OpenVINO and ONNX, improving system accuracy and performance.
Reduced mean orientation error (MOE) by 80% in object pose estimation through scene reconstruction and ICP registration, enhancing accuracy in confined-space manipulations.
Reduced planning and execution times by 50% and ensured deterministic outcomes by developing a custom search-based(A*) path planner.
Enhanced robotic insertion accuracy and robustness by applying sensor fusion (encoder data and object surface estimation) with Kalman filtering for precise package angle determination.
Ensured operational reliability by implementing comprehensive logging and metrics collection using AWS CloudWatch, enabling real-time insights and alerts.
Streamlined the development pipeline and reduced deployment times by automating large-scale node deployments with Ansible, Docker, and GitLab CI/CD.

Experience.title: Lead Robotics Software Engineer
points: Led development of autonomous warehouse solutions for sorting, palletization, and loading/unloading, achieving throughput targets with high reliability.
Managed a team developing motion planning, grasp planning, and control libraries, overseeing system integration and cross-team collaboration.

Experience.title: Robotics Software Engineer
points: Integrated sampling-based and search-based planners, accommodating various constraints to optimize performance.
Implemented dynamic object tracking with sensor fusion of Time-of-Flight(ToF) cameras, IR sensors, and encoders to optimize visual servoing performance on a conveyor.
Implemented object detection, segmentation, and pose estimation for boxes and envelopes using classical computer vision techniques with OpenCV and PCL.
Optimized planning efficiency by 25% by profiling bottlenecks using perf and implementing multithreaded constraints checking in C++ with OpenMP.
Developed an admittance control for contact-driven tasks like box stacking, utilizing a 6D force-torque sensor.

Experience.title: Co-Founder
points: Developed a machine shop monitoring system and analysis dashboard, integrated into the University website for students to check equipment usage.
Implemented power consumption analysis using time series k-means clustering to identify machine usage patterns.

Experience.title: Mechanical Designer, Intern
points: Designed a PCB space analysis algorithm using ImageJ, enhanced with decision trees for accurate component classification and segmentation.
Engineered a high-resolution PCB imaging system using image stitching, improving inspection accuracy and efficiency.

Experience.title: Mechanical Designer, Intern
points: Managed top-level assembly and created 2D drawings and BOMs for sub-assemblies.
Performed 3D surface modeling of antenna traces and design of assembly jigs.
Designed a prototype of a side-key protection tape to ensure the part is delivered intact.
Supported Finite Element Analysis (FEA) by providing simplified part meshes.
Performed interference check regularly and provided feedback to senior mechanical designers and electrical engineers to ensure seamless integration of subsystems.

Experience.title: Controls Designer, Intern
points: Enhanced HMI software and PLC logic for manual control of an AGV, conveyors, and fault messaging systems.
Modified DDE server software and integrated line monitoring with PLC and MySQL to incorporate new machines.
Developed a Visual Basic application to prioritize fault messages and notify technicians.

Experience.title: Software Verification, Intern
points: Automated Hardware-In-the-Loop (HIL) test cases for satellite communication software.

Publications: Kwon M., [et al] (2018) A Robotic System for Autonomous Grasping and Manipulation. In: Sun Y., Falco J. (eds) Robotic Grasping and Manipulation 2016.
Liu S., [et al, Kwon M.] (2017) Grasp quality evaluation and planning for objects with negative curvature.
